title: The Republic of Tea – Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas - Hot Apple Cider and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea Bundle – 36 Count Tea Bags Each
descriptions:
Product Name: The Republic of Tea – Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas - Hot Apple Cider and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea Bundle – 36 Count Tea Bags Each

Description:

Experience the flavors of autumn with our Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas bundle! This delightful set includes two distinct, caffeine-free blends: Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea. Each tea is packed with 36 count tea bags, perfect for sharing or savoring throughout the season.

Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea:

Taste the essence of apple cider with this naturally caffeine-free blend. Infused with the flavors of apple, cinnamon, and cloves, this tea promises a comforting and warming experience. The ingredients include apple pieces, cinnamon, orange peel, rose hips, berry leaves, natural flavors, ginger root, cloves, citric acid, and cardamom seeds.

Caramel Apple Herbal Tea:

Indulge in the sweetness of caramel apples with this caffeine-free blend. Featuring a base of South African Rooibos, this tea combines the flavors of sweet apples, vanilla, and caramel for a decadent treat. The ingredients include Rooibos, apple bits, natural apple and caramel flavors, and vanilla extract.

Steeping Instructions:

Bring water to a rolling boil, then pour 6 oz of water over one tea bag. Allow the tea to steep for 5-7 minutes to fully extract the flavors. Once you're done, add your used tea bags to compost or soil to give back to the earth.

Ideal For:

This bundle is the perfect accompaniment to the harvest season and makes a delightful dessert tea. Sip it on its own or pair it with your favorite fall treats for a truly indulgent experience.

Product Type: Herbal Tea Bundle
